comments:
The following problem prevents me completely from quering any bugzilla repository.

Build ID: I20070410-1043

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open Dialog 'Search', choose tab 'Task Search'
2. select repository 'https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs'
3. Enter some text to 'Summary/taskId contains' (i.e. 'Properties')
4. Press Search button

The following is an error message (see Summary) and the error log contains the follwing new entry:

eclipse.buildId=I20070410-1043
java.version=1.6.0
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=de_DE
Framework arguments:  -startup C:\Develop\eclipse 3.3M6+\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070409.jar
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -startup C:\Develop\eclipse 3.3M6+\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070409.jar

Error
Sat May 05 13:51:46 GMT+01:00 2007
An internal error occurred during: "Querying Repository...".

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access
at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3534)
at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3457)

at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.search.SearchHitCollector.aboutToStart(SearchHitCollector.java:59)

Should be fixed in latest dev build: http://download.eclipse.org/technology/mylar/update-site/dev/e3.3
